import React from "react"; import FormStyled from "./FormStyled"; import { useState } from "react"; const Form: React.FC = () => { const timeElapsed = Date.now(); const today = new Date(timeElapsed); const hoje = today.toLocaleDateString(); const [showElement, setShowElement] = useState(true); const showOrHide = () => setShowElement(!showElement); const [showElement2, setShowElement2] = useState(true); const showOrHide2 = () => setShowElement2(!showElement2); return (

) : null} {showElement2 ? (

) : null}

 ); }; export default Form;
